Method Detail

twitterDB

public static void twitterDB(java.lang.String tweetPic,
                             java.lang.String screenName,
                             java.lang.String Location,
                             java.lang.String Description,
                             java.lang.String userTweet,
                             int retweets)
Parameters:
tweetPic - profile picture of twitter user
screenName - twitter id of the twitter user
Location - the address (if available) of the twitter user
Description - the short description of the twitter user
userTweet - the current tweet being inserted into the database
retweets - the number of retweets of the current tweet

venuesDB

public static void venuesDB(java.lang.String VenueName,
                            java.lang.String Address,
                            java.lang.String URL,
                            java.lang.String Description)
Parameters:
VenueName - name of the venue
Address - the address/ location of the venue (if provided)
URL - the url of the venue (if provided)
Description - a brief description of the venue (if provided)
